titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 78) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2004, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-383, by Mr. Linder.
The Joint Resolution shall be considered in the House.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 130.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 450.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 406 - 2 (Roll no. 645).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/20/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 78 (further continuing appropriations for FY 2004).
